artist: Artist: Torii Kotondo; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: so-called brown version; head and torso of woman wearing black and white patterned kimono and obi with red, pink, green and white floral design; same image as L2001.372.155 with different colors
inscription: 昭和四年十一月 {Shōwa yonen jūichigatsu} (November 1929)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 紫 {shi}; LLC, publisher seal: カワグチ {Kawaguchi}; on back, embossed: 参百五拾枚限絶版　第百五十一號 {sanbyakugojū mai kagiri zeppan, dai hyakugojūichi gō} (limited edition of 350, number 151); stamp: MADE IN JAPAN
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Sash
